mapper.update:
update t_device
DEVICECODE = #{devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICENAME = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICEGROUP = #{devicegroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICEDESC = #{devicedesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICETYPECODE = #{devicetypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICETYPENAME = #{devicetypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPCODE = #{compcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPNAME = #{compname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADUPGRADETYPE = #{adupgradetype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDITTIME = #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DEVICEID = #{deviceid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_device set DEVICECODE = #{devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICENAME = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICEGROUP = #{devicegroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICEDESC = #{devicedesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICETYPECODE = #{devicetypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICETYPENAME = #{devicetypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPCODE = #{compcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPNAME = #{compname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADUPGRADETYPE = #{adupgradetype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDITTIME = #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DEVICEID = #{deviceid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from t_device where DEVICECODE=#{devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or COMPCODE=#{compcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ADDRESS asc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_device( DEVICEID, DEVICECODE, DEVICENAME, DEVICEGROUP, DEVICEDESC, LNG, LAT, ADDRESS, DEVICETYPECODE, DEVICETYPENAME, COMPCODE, COMPNAME, ADUPGRADETYPE, CREATETIME, EDITTIME, CREATOR )VALUES
( #{element.deviceid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.devicegroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.devicedesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{element.lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.devicetypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.devicetypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.compcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.compname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.adupgradetype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{element.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{element.edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{element.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select DEVICECODE from t_device order by COMPCODE asc
select from t_device where ADDRESS=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ADDRESS asc
